text: skin vision offers a mobile application
on Android and iOS that allows people to
assess moles for potential risk of skin
cancer in the comfort of their own home
what we see as a new frontier in digital
healthcare is really making sure
technology enables people to do early
detection and awareness of any
conditions they might have without the
cloud we wouldn't be able to do this
securely cost-effectively and at scale
in addition to running our back-end
services and web portals we use Amazon's
infrastructure to run our machine
learning and risk assessment service as
well as training our networks for us and
the way the society currently is
developing it clearly shows that the
current healthcare systems will not be
able to cope with the pressure and the
cost therefore it's mandatory that
technology is being used to keep people
healthy and keep health care affordable
for me personally a great motivator is
the daily testimonials that we get from
our users telling us how scan vision has
helped them to find skin cancer for them
or their loved ones we're working with
AWS to make sure we can put this
technology in the hands of the masses
